subject: Update location info to include object owner
revisions:
[{'number': 2, 'created': '2016-10-09 12:49:10.000000000', 'files': ['shade/_normalize.py', 'shade/openstackcloud.py'], 'message': "Update location info to include object owner

Many OpenStack objects (but not all, grrr) return information about the
project that owns the resource. When we add location info to an object
record, that's the information we care about. Update current_location so
that it wraps a private method that allows explicit passing in of a
project_id to override the token's project_id. If the project_id and the
token's project_id are the same, we can continue to pull out project and
domain name information for readability.

Change-Id: I2a7e6003a2b75894907f90c9ab94244a769a892f
"}]
commit_message:
Update location info to include object owner

Many OpenStack objects (but not all, grrr) return information about the
project that owns the resource. When we add location info to an object
record, that's the information we care about. Update current_location so
that it wraps a private method that allows explicit passing in of a
project_id to override the token's project_id. If the project_id and the
token's project_id are the same, we can continue to pull out project and
domain name information for readability.

Change-Id: I2a7e6003a2b75894907f90c9ab94244a769a892f

commit_message:
Add retries for neutron-db-sync task

Exec 'neutron-db-sync' fails without any chance to retry via
additional puppet runs if it was completed successfully on the first
run. Adding retries reduces the likelihood that deployment fails.

Change-Id: I27522de30fc29ef7516e3c9baf36516723ced4a5
Related-bug: #1620268
Signed-off-by: Maksim Malchuk <mmalchuk@mirantis.com>

commit_message:
Enable release notes translation

Releasenote translation publishing is being prepared. 'locale_dirs'
needs to be defined in conf.py to generate translated version of the
release notes.

Note that this repository might not get translated release notes - or
no translations at all - but we add the entry here nevertheless to
prepare for it.

Change-Id: I9db09c7585e9e1041139970ca848f77b38424a6f

revisions:
[{'number': 6, 'created': '2016-09-30 22:46:19.000000000', 'files': ['test-requirements.txt'], 'message': "Update test-requirements.txt

The testing requirements should not cause extra packaging
work for deployers (since these aren't required to deploy).
This patch brings it in line with the latest global requirements,
except for python-swiftclient itself (which I kept with no version
specifier). By being in line with global requirements, this is a
more accurate list with respect to how things are actually tested
in the gate.

Change-Id: Iddc92d9bb135144d38c3e5aec2e95df5787e9b5b
"}]
commit_message:
Update test-requirements.txt

The testing requirements should not cause extra packaging
work for deployers (since these aren't required to deploy).
This patch brings it in line with the latest global requirements,
except for python-swiftclient itself (which I kept with no version
specifier). By being in line with global requirements, this is a
more accurate list with respect to how things are actually tested
in the gate.

Change-Id: Iddc92d9bb135144d38c3e5aec2e95df5787e9b5b

subject: standardize release note page ordering
revisions:
[{'number': 2, 'created': '2016-10-12 11:33:14.000000000', 'files': ['releasenotes/source/index.rst'], 'message': 'standardize release note page ordering

In order to support automatically updating the release notes when we
create stable branches, we want the pages to be in a standard order.
This patch updates the order to be reverse chronological, so the most
recent notes appear at the top.

Change-Id: Ib364dcc8eb31275a31c83b68d7914263b183e393
Signed-off-by: Doug Hellmann <doug@doughellmann.com>
'}]
commit_message:
standardize release note page ordering

In order to support automatically updating the release notes when we
create stable branches, we want the pages to be in a standard order.
This patch updates the order to be reverse chronological, so the most
recent notes appear at the top.

Change-Id: Ib364dcc8eb31275a31c83b68d7914263b183e393
Signed-off-by: Doug Hellmann <doug@doughellmann.com>

commit_message:
Add standard attributes to the core network resources

Add the created_at, revision_number, and updated_at standard
attributes to the core (floating IP, network, port, router,
security group, security group rule, subnet and subnet pool)
network resources.

Partially-Implements: blueprint network-command-sdk-support

subject: Install test requirements for plugins
revisions:
[{'number': 3, 'created': '2016-10-12 12:26:15.000000000', 'files': ['tasks/tempest_install.yml'], 'message': "Install test requirements for plugins

The ceilometer role is currently failing with the following
error:

ImportError: No module named gabbi

This is due to https://review.openstack.org/304500 adding a
new test which uses 'gabbi'. This exposes the fact that the
tempest plugin execution should have the dependencies in
test-requirements.txt installed into the tempest venv.

This patch ensures that the plugin installation also installs
all the test-requirements if they exist.

Combined backport of:
- https://review.openstack.org/384225
- https://review.openstack.org/385355

Change-Id: I9f2bece22a0098416f2d95f8a6003483e9821105
(cherry picked from commit 135d03446c45309df1423e0971fab180587849d7)
"}]
commit_message:
Install test requirements for plugins

The ceilometer role is currently failing with the following
error:

ImportError: No module named gabbi

This is due to https://review.openstack.org/304500 adding a
new test which uses 'gabbi'. This exposes the fact that the
tempest plugin execution should have the dependencies in
test-requirements.txt installed into the tempest venv.

This patch ensures that the plugin installation also installs
all the test-requirements if they exist.

Combined backport of:
- https://review.openstack.org/384225
- https://review.openstack.org/385355

Change-Id: I9f2bece22a0098416f2d95f8a6003483e9821105
(cherry picked from commit 135d03446c45309df1423e0971fab180587849d7)
